website_summaries.verdict: The LG Tone Pro is an inexpensive pair of wireless earphones with a comfortable design and a wallet-friendly price, but they could use a bass boost.
pros: Functional design with magnetic earpiece storage

customer_reviews.title: Broke quickly
customer_reviews.text: I've had three of these and always loved them. The sound is great and they're intuitive to use. BUT they don't last worth a bean. I bought this latest one six weeks ago. The left earpiece lost volume last week and the right earpiece just stopped working today. I'm so mad...this is two weeks outside the return window. Junk. Don't buy them. I hate to say it but it's true.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Amazing...When they work.
customer_reviews.text: If you’re looking for a headset with an uncertain lifespan, this is the headset for you! For some, they may last a year and for others, they may last a month. In my case, it took around 6 months for the left side to stop working after use of around an hour a day. Suprisingly, the older LG Tone models seem to last longer than many of the new ones! Thankfully, this model was rather cheap. If you are willing to take the chance, I highly suggest you follow up with a warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Juke

customer_reviews.title: Best Bargain in Town with Quality
customer_reviews.text: This is the most affordable wireless headset. The battery seems to last forever (although lasted a bit longer on my older model. The over-the neck feature means that you'll never lose it (unlike every other pair that I have misplaced). This wires to the ear-buds are longer than in older models and fit into a magnetic socket in the neck piece. Compared to previous models the wires to not stick out like some alien antenna. Much more discrete than older models. A nice feature I recommend you use, as the dangling earbuds often tangle with my necklace or wired headset when I use one.
customer_reviews.author: Flyingpumpkin

customer_reviews.title: T
customer_reviews.text: These are outstanding..they had functions that I was unaware of when I purchased them..When you download the LG Tone & Talk the features are incredible..All my co-workers are amazed at the things this Bluetooth does that there's doesn't...These are by far the best bluetooth I have ever owned..After I purchased them three days later they were $20 cheaper..I emailed the seller, HiloPlace and he called me the same day to tell me my refund was sent..I never had a refund come to quickly with no questions asked....HiloPlace is the Best..
customer_reviews.author: Laurice

customer_reviews.title: It's ok... for a while
customer_reviews.text: When I first started using it it worked well. Good clear sounds, quick setup and fits comfortably on my neck. However the sound quality has gone down to almost nothing, one bud is basically dead but if you don't put both in it's harder to hear anything from the other side/bud. I work for the post office and be on the move a lot so this was to help keep my hands free. I've stopped using it.
customer_reviews.author: Hero Stoneheart

customer_reviews.title: Malfunctioning Cheap Headphones
customer_reviews.text: Cheap Product! I had them for two months and I started having low volume problems (at the two week mark), then came the shortage (at the month mark) and now the earbud (right earbud) that didn’t work at all works now (but very very low) and the earbud (left earbud) that worked just fine all of the sudden stopped malfunctioning completely. I haven’t touched these headphones for two weeks until today. So why are they malfunctioning like this?!
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Stewart

customer_reviews.title: Very Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had the HBS-760 model which worked fantastic until the earbud wire eventually failed. I decided to get the 780. Wrong choice. Sounds output is good, however the microphones are horrid. The only way for someone to hear me is by placing the hard plastic across my face directly under my mouth. I would not recommend at all
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Bootleg Beware
customer_reviews.text: My headset (780) failed outside the Amazon return window - the mic stopped working. So I returned it to LG because it was still covered by the manufacturer's warranty. LG refused to repair it saying it had been refurbished. It is being sold on Amazon as new. Be careful what you buy from this vendor (Miami Buys Inc). The headset itself was great...too bad mine wasn't really new.
customer_reviews.author: Larry Jo

customer_reviews.title: The cons out-weigh the pros.
customer_reviews.text: Here's the good, The product review states the LG Tone Pro HBS-780 will play music to to 10.5 hours, these have lasted as long as 13 hours on a single charge. The down side is the maximum volume is extremely poor. I'm a landscaper and I ensure loud noises all day and what's the point of having a long battery life if I can't hear my music.
customer_reviews.author: David Bishop

customer_reviews.title: do not charge this with wall charger only a usb port
customer_reviews.text: Battery failed after 2 months use. from some investigation I have found several comments that charging this unit with a standard phone wall charger is to much for the battery and will lead to failure. it should only be plugged into a usb port on a computer as the supply a lower amperage. I gave this a low rating as I have had other LG Tone products in the past that have lasted a lot longer than this one even with wall charger but I now believe that they have all failed due to this same issue. I will be purchasing another one of these and only charging on USB and we shall see how it goes
customer_reviews.author: Cory W

customer_reviews.title: The Best
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 pair of different brand Bluetooth headphones before buying these. I was being cheap and didn't want to spend the money. The other headphones were Horrible. I should have purchased these in the beginning and saved myself the aggravation of dealing with the others. These are totally worth the price. The sound is great, the battery life is long, and they are comfortable around my neck. I listen to these all day at work and there is still battery life the next day. I got the warranty because we all know how headphones are, eventually there might be an issue, but so far so good with these. Definitely worth my investment.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Davenport

customer_reviews.title: After 4 months 1 bud is dead.
customer_reviews.text: Got these for my husband to use at work. He liked them well enough, though the sound quality was only ok compared to previous LG headphones we got and same with the battery life. Also the magnets weren't strong enough to keep the earbuds in and he could only have 1 in his ear while working, so the other one would fall down. Today at work the right bud just stopped working in the middle of an audiobook he was listening to. The left one still works fine. Probably would have been 3 stars at best before this failure.
customer_reviews.author: RizuScho

customer_reviews.title: Defective upon arrival. DO NOT BUY
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box did not work. One headphone no sound at all. The other was so quiet on full sound I couldn't barely hear it. Was so low I didn't hear it at first. I have always had LGs and never had a problem which leads me to think this is Amazon issue. Possibly selling used as new. I l have owned LG headphones for 10 years. They usually last about 2-3 years with daily use which is more than worth it in my book- I don't see myself ever buying another brand. That said- this pair is going back and I will buy them from a brick and mortar store
customer_reviews.author: Trish T

customer_reviews.title: I love lg tones but not these.
customer_reviews.text: The only reason why give a horrible review to these specific tones are 2 reasons. The 1st reason is that the magnet that is supposed to keep the earbuds in does not work as well as it should. The 2nd reason is one of the mirror pieces no longer work within 3 months of having them. Battery life is not as good as the other tones which I had purchased at least 3 other LG tone products in the past 6 years. I switched over to the Samsung levels and I am not impressed so I will be coming back to LG tones but I will make sure not to buy these ones again.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SOUND, EASY TO USE, HAS CLEAR VOICE PROMPT
customer_reviews.text: I love these headsets. I have one in white and one in black. I now own for a year and use them both daily. One for my phone, the other for ipad. The buds are on wires, so you do need to be mindful, but I have given them some abuse and have never had an issue. Since my 1st purchase, I bought sets for my adult son and daughter, and they also love them. Enjoy the very clear sound quality. When you turn on, the prompt automatically tells you the level of the battery. Easy on off switch and sound volume level buttons. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Teekey

customer_reviews.title: Best pair of headphones I've ever bought!!
customer_reviews.text: Best headphones I have ever bought!! I had an issue finding headphones that didn't cut out when I walked around my factory or too close to other electronics which is difficult to do but a coworker had a pair he said they never cut out so I tried em n fell in love. When they say quality over quantity they mean it I normally spent around $20 or less on headphones n paid just under $50 for these n it was well worth it. They come with a USB charging cord and extra earbuds for size. I love that it vibrates for notications and actually speaks English, very easy to connect and last a good 8-10 hours on full charge.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin

customer_reviews.title: Avoid.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been satisfied with LG in the past, but these have been trouble. Construction wise and battery, they’re great, but sound quality has greatly diminished in the three months I’ve had them, likely due to waxes and oils. I’ve tried all the tricks to clean them to marginal success. To get any sound, volume is to be maxed out, which greatly diminishes the battery and the sound you get is heavily distorted, bass is overbearing and blown and the highs are quiet and tinny. With no way to disassemble the buds themselves to clean, I’m stranded with a defective product.
customer_reviews.author: R. Stevens

customer_reviews.title: Sold me used headphones for full price
customer_reviews.text: I purchased 2 sets of these headphones (new) at the same time. This pair was not in the original packaging (the other one was). This set was missing 2 earbud adapters. But worst of all, THERE WAS EARWAX IN THEM! They obviously were not new. Now, I have to go through the hassle of returning them, waiting for a refund, then waiting again for a new pair.
customer_reviews.author: Jacquelyn

customer_reviews.title: Does not last
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this headset and all its upgrades for the past 4 years. They typically last about one year and I am okay with that. The right earbud stopped working after a month on this last one and I sent it back as instructed by the manufacturer. After a few weeks, the headset came back saying no defects detected. The right earbud is still not working. I am very disappointed in LG, not sure where we will go from here.
customer_reviews.author: D. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Did not work properly out of the package
customer_reviews.text: Things to note, Arrived quickly, packaging was undamaged, product was undamaged. That being said the volume balancing between left and right earphones was so vast that at maximum volume I could barely hear anything out of the right earphone while at home with no noise, however the left earphone was so loud I could hear everything while walking down a busy highway. Also worth mentioning is that it seems the right earphone produces a lot of bass but no treble while the left earphone seems to produce a lot of treble with no bass. I was excited to upgrade from my aging HBS-760 to these HBS-780 but over all I was greatly disappointed right out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: D.E. Berthiaume

customer_reviews.title: Choose another brand these are junk
customer_reviews.text: They work better after equalizer sound boost if your having troubles hearing out of one side hit the play button twice numerous times. If yours collects ear wax take an air compressor blower nozzle and blow out the mesh pad you wont have anymore trouble with them for hearing. I'd love to tell lg what I think about this product and tell them how to do it without all these stupid modifications. It ain't worth the money. I now have two of these one through a phone store costing 76 dollars and these are 50. Things aren't made to last anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quit working before Warranty was out. I bought 2 pair, both quit working
customer_reviews.text: People were unable to hear me speaking clearly. They said they only could hear broken sentences or scratchy sounds. I bought one for my husband and one for me. When I called him, his did the same thing. AWFUL! Tried calling customer service, 800-243-0000, never could get anyone to answer, they seemed to always be closed on days I would call. As I have two of these and they were not cheap, I wanted to see about getting them repaired or buy parts myself and repair. As of today, still haven't been able to reach anyone at the 800 #.
customer_reviews.author: Lcarnes

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: The sound quality is ok, but it drops the Bluetooth connection very easily and the earbuds are heavy, uncomfortable and drop out easily. I’ve had many LG Bluetooth headphones similar to these before and have really liked them. Unfortunately my dog also likes them and has used several sets as a chew toy. But this set/design does not work very well on a variety of fronts.
customer_reviews.author: J. Brian Cargill

customer_reviews.title: Great product in theory, but...
customer_reviews.text: I've had this headset for a while now and upgraded from a previous generation hbs set. I love the product and features, but this is my second time having to get lg to repair them. For no reason one of the ear buds just stopped working. First on the right and after that repair I just had to send them in today because the left earbud went out. Luckily the LG repair process is just a simple online form so it's not a huge hassle to send them in.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Benninger

customer_reviews.title: Only worked 2 months great when it worked
customer_reviews.text: Product was great when it worked had it less than 2 months when notice only 1 ear side was working. Then shortly after that notice had to keep tapping the other side to get it to work any movement of my head cause me to lose connection. Def upset😡. Bought a pair for $5 and they're still working only problems with those is battery life is too short, so figured I'd get these for $80 they should be great plus I had a pair of LG years ago and loved them. Don't know what happened to product quality
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: These are perfect for my needs although even the smaller earbud covers ...
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect for my needs although even the smaller earbud covers are a little bit too big for me and feel uncomfortable.I usually only use one of them in one or the other ear because it makes my ear sore. The sound is very good and the microphone seems very good too,no one has ever said they couldn't hear me or my voice is breaking up. So, for the price a pretty good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Marie H. Florida, U.S.A

customer_reviews.title: Great value, not the best LG has to offer.
customer_reviews.text: I love LG products and I have used up two of these units. Each lasts me a couple years, and I mostly listen to audio books. I’m heading on a trip and just wanted a cheap pair since they will be squished a bit. These are not as comfortable as the last pairs as the wires to the ear plugs barely make it to the storage openings, barely enough to make it to the ears, so that sometimes when I turn my head, they tug. I should have gone more expensive, but for $30, these will do.
customer_reviews.author: Lesa from Bethel

customer_reviews.title: Piece of Junk!!
customer_reviews.text: Have owned 4 LGs before and was very happy, but the 780 is junk. Replaced first one because it stopped working. Now the replacement's on/off switch stopped working. For last few weeks took 10-20 tries to get it to work. Had to cover it with a towel while working out otherwise would start switching between songs, rewind video, etc on it's own.
customer_reviews.author: Randy B

customer_reviews.title: Cheap Quality/Poor Design
customer_reviews.text: I had the HBS 750 headset for at least 5 years before it stopped working completely. Although only one side worked, I was still able to use it since I only used one side at a time. I ordered the HBS 780 as a replacement and it is awful. The magnet didn't hold the earbud very well so it was always falling out and the wires are very thin. With it falling out all of the time it would get caught on my shirt or purse strap. It was about 6 months before one side of the 780 model was no longer working. I would never purchase this product again nor would I recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: P. Johns

customer_reviews.title: Broke 3 months after buying.
customer_reviews.text: Headphone stopped working 3 months after purchase. Wasn't abused but it was used regularly. Waste of money and time. Starting to wonder if LG's quality is going down.
customer_reviews.author: anonymous

customer_reviews.title: Right speaker stopped working after 5 months
customer_reviews.text: Right ear speaker went silent after 5 months of everyday use. Something probably pulled inside the cable to it. I blame bad design, because it's hard to put the speakers back into the neckband holders every time and so they end up dangling around and getting caught in stuff. I didn't expect a real LG neckband headphone to have a lack of durability I had come to expect from one of its Chinese clones.
customer_reviews.author: BubbaHoTep

customer_reviews.title: I wanted to love these
customer_reviews.text: I had such high hopes for these. I had ordered 2 other pairs first that said they could pair to 2 phones at once and found out later the packaging was incorrect. While these do pair with 2 phones at once the sound quality is mediocre at best. On top of that, the ear pieces are not comfortable regardless of which size you have on. There don't block out any surrounding noise. They look great, but aren't functional. Good battery life and are light weight.
customer_reviews.author: Perks

customer_reviews.title: Microphones are horrible
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds are nice and crisp sounding but the microphones don’t pick up my voice. Had these 1 day and my coworkers say I sound muffled. Have headphones turned all the way up but the mics that capture my voice are crap. Probably going to return today. Lame....these better not be refurbs and not told about it....seems kinda sketchy. * got a second pair to make sure it wasn’t my phone. These things are trash if I could give zero stars I would. Coworkers can’t even hear me on a conference call. Don’t buy. These are trash. Going back to reliable Bose.
customer_reviews.author: Chase

customer_reviews.title: Been a complete disappointment. Won't keep a charge
customer_reviews.text: Been a complete disappointment. Won't keep a charge. Keeps cutting out. Turns itself off without any buttons or prompts. Only 6 weeks old. I am sure it is just this particular unit, as my wife has a white set and it works amazingly. I think I got a bad apple.
customer_reviews.author: Gregg Frost "Frosty"

customer_reviews.title: Great headset!
customer_reviews.text: I read a lot of complaints about the sound quality and battery life stating that both were krapp before I purchased them. Don't believe it! I listen to my radio station from 8:00 a.m. until I go home at 5:00 p.m. and I still could talk if I need it to once I got home. Great battery life and the clarity is perfect, no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Anne

customer_reviews.title: Best Wireless Headset
customer_reviews.text: This is the best headset I've owned. The sound quality is awesome. Battery lasts a long time. Earbuds stay in your ears no matter what activity you're doing. Just put it around your neck and go on with your day. You won't even know it's there until the phone rings and it vibrates. Also has a Talk to Text feature, so if you're working out and you get a text, you don't have to stop and look at your phone, as it reads the text to you.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph DAli

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed not what I was used to!
customer_reviews.text: I had to change from the LG HBS760 after 4 years using the LG HBS780. These are the *upgraded*ones. The battery don't last as long and the 760s. The sound quality is not good. I could go on about the differences but I won't. LG is a good brand I just think they missed the mark on the 780s.
customer_reviews.author: RODNEY

customer_reviews.title: Battery life 15 hours +
customer_reviews.text: This is my second set of the HBS-780’s. My first set the earbuds went out after 6 months. I use them while I’m working and I’m pretty rough on them. So I think I’ll only get 6 months to a year out of headphones no matter what. The sound quality is very good The most impressive thing to me is the battery it lasts me all day. That starts with my morning work out and goes all the way through my after work activities. So that’s up to 15 hours with out recharge
customer_reviews.author: CJB

customer_reviews.title: works great and sounds great.
customer_reviews.text: these work as advertised, even if the battery life is not quite 10 hrs on full volume. my only complaint is how the buds snap back into the collar. it seems like they dont stay or go in as easily as the hbs-70. the sound it really good though and the battery definately lasts longer.
customer_reviews.author: LordWrexius

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these as a surprise for my husband who had an earlier pair of tones that eventually gave out on him. He uses his headsets for hand free calling, and listening to metal core/heavy instrumental metal and these work great for him for both. I saw other reviewers complaining about bass with these but that isn't an issue for his uses. He always has them around his neck - and they don't rub or anything. The battery life is great - he has charged them twice in the past few weeks. He does wish the magnets that hold the earbud in was a little stronger, but it doesn't actively bother him.
customer_reviews.author: C Woolard

customer_reviews.title: HOWEVER I AM NOT PLEASED WITH MINE
customer_reviews.text: I GOT A PAIR FOR ME AND A FRIEND. MY FRIEND LIKES HERS. HOWEVER I AM NOT PLEASED WITH MINE. THE VOLUME IN THE LEFT EAR IS SUDDENLY EXTREMELY LOW. I CAN BARELY HEAR ANY SOUND ON THAT SIDE.TO MAKE MATTERS WORSE THEY DON'T FIT PROPERLY IN MY EARS. I CONSTANTLY HAVE TO RE ADJUST THEM. IT SEEMS LIKE THEY ARE TOO LARGE EVEN AFTER CHANGING THE BUDS TO THE SMALLEST SIZE. THESE AREN'T A GOOD FIT.
customer_reviews.author: nachell ivory

customer_reviews.title: Uncomfortable and Bulky
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace my old LG Tone headset that died while I was on vacation. I put the new headset on and immediately found it uncomfortable and grating in my ear. The whole package was also bulkier and heavier than previous versions of the LG Tone headsets. It also came only with medium and small ear bud sizes and is unable to accept large silicone ear buds because then the ear pieces won't lock into the socket and hold correctly. If you can buy an older set, even at a higher price do so. Avoid this at all costs.
customer_reviews.author: Michael H.

customer_reviews.title: Well designed
customer_reviews.text: Love this headset! I’ve had 5 similar headsets, all about the same price, and this is the best design. The actual ear buds are comfortable and magnetically attach easily to the headset when not in use. I don’t have an issue as reported by others getting the cover for the charging cable open-using a fingernail does the trick very easily. Sound and battery life are good. Pairs easily and quickly too. I’d buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonReaderDA

customer_reviews.title: Defective Headset, ear bud stopped working in 2 months!
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I had the old style, maybe original?, of the LG Tone but after about 2 years they stopped working. That's fine, we got a good 2 years out of them so I ordered him this new set a little over 2 months ago and one of the earbuds is already not working! I'd like to think it was just a one-product malfunction and was going to message the supplier and see if there was something we could do. Return, refund, exchange, etc., but there's no button to contact to supplier! I hate leaving bad reviews but it's the only way I can see to maybe get a response.
customer_reviews.author: Cheyenne

customer_reviews.title: Didn't last
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these headphones for my workout and less than 2 weeks later, 1 side went out. The batter life sucks!!! My other LG headphones last at least 2 days without recharging. These barely lasted a day and I don't use them all the time. I am glad I sent them back. The sound quality was ok but when something is directly in your ear, you don't need but so much sound anyway.
customer_reviews.author: Loves to shop

customer_reviews.title: Dead within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I bought these in March and used them every day. Overall happy with the product. My previous pair were top-of-the-line and very comparable in functionality. A week ago the left earbud stopped working. Today the entire set is completely dead and not working. It’s only June... I will not be buying this again. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Virginia L. Schwarten

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for a month, downhill from there :(
customer_reviews.text: I am a longtime LG headset bluetooth user, so I ordered another pair. I really liked this headset for about 1 month, then folks started complaining about the quality they heard on the other end. Then about another month later the left ear completely died and I can't hear anything. I'm disappointed in this purchase and unsure if I'll be loyal to LG again.
customer_reviews.author: Susan A Foreman

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even make it 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I have owned several pair of LG Tones and they usually last me about 18 months give or take. This pair started showing signs of audio loss after 5 and now not even 3 months later the left earbud is almost completely dead. Very disappointed with them. In fact I think after several pair of Tones it is time to find a new brand... these are too expensive to be replacing as frequently as they need to be.
customer_reviews.author: M. Stanly

customer_reviews.title: They ok...while they last.
customer_reviews.text: This replaced an older pair I had for years, looking forward to several more with this pair. 6+ month update... Everything was going awesome with the headphones and unfortunately one ear piece gave out. Luckily LG was able to replace the defective unit....a few months passed and the issue happened again, this time LG is making it such a pain in the ass to replace, even though it’s still under the 1 year warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.  Great for low activity people
customer_reviews.text: Love the sound. Third pair of lg headphones ive owned. But the wires keep getting smaller. Witch makes them cheaper and not as durable. The ear piece popped off my last pair. Wont be surprised if it happens again. Last pair of LG headphones for me until they make the wires braided, for durability.
customer_reviews.author: jack johnson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for "on the go" headphones.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. These are a replacement buy to replace a pair that finally gave out. I bought them so fast I forgot to choose my color. But the Blue Matte finish was just fine. I am very happy w/ these style of phones for my particular needs. Strongly recommend. Super fast shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Robert L

customer_reviews.title: Repaired product, and they did a poor job of it!
customer_reviews.text: There are two wires that go from the end of the earbud to the body of the "collar". One of those wires is flexible, and the other is very stiff. The stiff one has started to fray at the point where the earbud attaches to the wire. This is sad since the unit functioned properly, but they chose to use a different wire when they repaired it, and now this is the weak point... once I start sweating on this wire, it's gonna short out.
customer_reviews.author: D. Feltz

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the HBS-780 headset and right out of the box the microphone didn't work. I got that one replaced, and then now, two months later, one earbud went out. Maybe it's just my luck, but I think it should work more than 2 months with light usage.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 would recommend
customer_reviews.text: Favorite wireless headphones I’ve ever tried. Sounds quality is great, range will reach from inside the house to outside the house, battery lasts about 24 hours of continuous usage, easy to use and figure out.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer bartotti

customer_reviews.title: terrible
customer_reviews.text: The sound is the best I can give and that’s 5 stars If you buy something make sure you get all this product only came with headset and cord. Nothing else. Distance is poor keeps saying of range and I’m like five feet away. 👎🏽 Thumbs down never buy something and you don’t have the kit and Caboodles
customer_reviews.author: Ronnii

customer_reviews.title: Best headset on the market! A must have!
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a UPS driver and uses this headset for easy communication while working. He also uses it to listen to music and podcasts while working. The device announces the caller or sender of the text message in his ear, allowing him to make important distinctions. This device has helped increase his safety while working. Compared to other similar devices he has tried, this one is the most durable and has the longest battery life. One charge lasts all day! This is must have for hands-free communication and entertainment!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan D

customer_reviews.title: The worst tones I've owned
customer_reviews.text: I've gone through four or five tones over the years... So I had a good idea what I was getting, but these are the worst by far of the lot. Sound quality is ok, but not as good, and the mic is certainly subpar. Don't even bother making a call with it. That was my big disappointment the others works very well for calls.
customer_reviews.author: K. Huffman

customer_reviews.title: Earpiece has a malfunction
customer_reviews.text: The best quality of this product is the battery life. I have always purchased this type Bluetooth after the wireless LG Motorola went off the market, which was the best! However, in the past 2-3 years there seems to be a problem with the earpiece failure. It lasts for only a few months, then it goes completely out and there’s nothing to be done except replace it! So this time I decided to be sure to purchase a warranty. So hopefully the company responsible will honor the warranty by replacing my item.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Lynn

customer_reviews.title: So nice I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: I adore these so much I bought two. I sleep in one and use the other during the day. But the battery life is so good sometimes they won’t run out even after eight hours of sleep and an eight hour work day. And even when they do, they recharge in an hour easy. My one qualm is the buttons are so smooth they’re a little difficult to tell apart. Well, I also don’t like that they beep to signify they’re about to play audio. But those are small things compared to the convenience of these headphones.
customer_reviews.author: millicent morley

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Really comfortable headphones, I usually forget they’re there. I use them for talking on the phone and listening to podcasts and the sound quality is fine for that. The headphones don’t always stay in the magnetic slots. I think that might be an issue if you’re very active with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki Byrd

customer_reviews.title: Alright L
customer_reviews.text: I liked my previous HBS-760s better, but these are still pretty good. The ear buds don't fit me as well, but that's a physical thing aG HBSn not necessarily a fault of their design.
customer_reviews.author: Kuch

customer_reviews.title: IN ABOUT 2 MONTHS 3 SETS I PURCHASED THE SOUND LEVEL TO MY EARBUDS WAS UNUSABLE
customer_reviews.text: I have ordered 3 of these now because they are so comfortable and userfriendly and the sound is good for my customers -BUT THE SOUND TO ME DIES TO ALMOST UNUSABLE LEVEL WITHIN 2 MONTHS. I HAVE ORDERED 3 BECAUSE I KEEP BELIEVING THE NEXT ONE WILL WORK LONGER- SO FAR NOT SO!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kris Levak

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: Everything works well for me sound wise and comfort, battery life not as long as my last LG wireless set. But the cord to the earbud pod is already split and exposing wires. I do use daily. For people that won't use them daily should be fine. I put a lot of wear to it
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: I like the headphones cuz they sound good and connects to ...
customer_reviews.text: I like the headphones cuz they sound good and connects to the cell phone right away and comfortable to ware. But the wife seems very thin. Im afraid the will break but hopeful they won’t. I have the first edition and lasted me years with no problems until the left side stopped working and the wire started to come out.
customer_reviews.author: Ed

customer_reviews.title: disconnects and re-connects
customer_reviews.text: this is the second pair of this headphones that I buy, the 1st pair was awesome but my granddaughter got a hold of them and tore one of the earbuds off. I ordered a second pair with the expectation of having the same quality but was sadly disappointed when after a week of using it, it started disconnecting and reconnecting during calls and music play. I hope this is just a glitch and not a reoccurring thing because this things are awesome as far as battery life and sound quality.
customer_reviews.author: Juan I.

customer_reviews.title: By far my favorite headset I've ever owned
customer_reviews.text: I'm on my third LG Pro headset within a 5 year period which I think is great that they last that long. Easy to pair with your phone, good quality sound and just pop the earbuds in and you're ready to go. I use them at the gym and they never fall out of my ears no matter what exercise I'm doing.
customer_reviews.author: Shell

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great product for the price. I use them everyday and while this is my 3 rd pair in the last 4 years, I don’t worry if something happens to them as they are cheap to replace compared to other brands
customer_reviews.author: kitkat

customer_reviews.title: The 750's are very good. The 780's are the next step up and ...
customer_reviews.text: Owned two of the HBS-750. The 750's are very good. The 780's are the next step up and being BlueTooth 4.0, the listening range is better and stronger. To date the headset has worked as expected and no problems. Great purchase at the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mark von Kugler

customer_reviews.title: Quit working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: I love this product and this is my third pair owning. The most recent set that I bought has now stopped working after only three months of use. I am very disappointed as I use these daily for work and personal use. This is the second pair where one of the ear pieces has stopped having sound after only a few months. If this were not the case, I would provide very high reviews but considering I have spent money more than once to have the same issue, I am very unhappy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sound but bad longevity
customer_reviews.text: The bluethooth is crisp unlike some others its clear bass to my liking surrounding sound light to carry i recommend it to anyone(just be ready to have one ear blow out after leas than a week of delivery
customer_reviews.author: Idinobi

customer_reviews.title: It works flawlessly.
customer_reviews.text: GREAT PRODUCE FOR THE PRICE. I love this headset. I have small ears and have always had a hard time fining anything that fits. This works great for me for phone calls and music which I little too most always. It bothers my husband that I wear it like a necklace but when you are mobile and do a lot of chores it is easy to keep track of. They do tend to be delicate so throwing them in a purse of bag is not a good idea unless you want to replace them often.
customer_reviews.author: Abbie

customer_reviews.title: Broken right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: I've had this product many times. Figured I'd buy a refurbed as you can't beat the price. But, clearly that was the issue. I recieved the item and immediately, one of the headphones isn't working. I can't afford to be without a headset due to my job, so rather than send it back to get a new one, I've kept the broken set. But it has taught me that you get what you pay for. I won't be buying from this particular company again.
customer_reviews.author: LittleRaccoon

customer_reviews.title: These are some great affordable bluetooth worked fine for about 2 weeks then the left went out
customer_reviews.text: I really liked the fast and easy delivery. The tracking and on screen delivery notification was really a plus. I even received an email to alert me that my delivery had been made and where it was placed. Way to go guys! Thanks! I am big on hands free driving. I don't always have my phone on me. I don't miss calls even with my phone on silent. The bluetooth vibrates when I get a call or when I venture too far away from my phone. Which also helps me keep up with my phone.
customer_reviews.author: Leroy Mr. lg Eason

customer_reviews.title: Not the best
customer_reviews.text: The headphones seem to work okay. I’m giving it one star for a few reasons. 1. The box was dropped off at my door WIDE OPEN. 2. The box for the headphones had been tampered with (seal was ripped). 3. The ear buds had CLEARLY been put in someone’s ears. 4. The headphones were covered in fingerprints. I would highly recommend buying from another seller, I guess I’ll keep them because I don’t want to go through the hassle of a return.
customer_reviews.author: Kristina

customer_reviews.title: then i was like whatever i'll make due
customer_reviews.text: these headphones came in a retail box but taped up, i had no idea they were refurbished, then i was like whatever i'll make due. then upon initial observation i noticed the dirt around the neck part and i cleaned it, connected the device and the right earbud did not work. ok no problem i'll just return them then boom i have to pay for return shipping on a defective product. WOW!!!! JUST WOW!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher M.

customer_reviews.title: Not pleased
customer_reviews.text: The headphones worked great but the first day after wearing them one of the clips that holds the wires together broke. I've had them now for almost two months and the wire that was left hanging has now frayed in the left side doesn't work. I was looking for a better set and I kept with LG because my last pair was really good but this is a different model and I was not happy.
customer_reviews.author: Johnathan

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished cheap parts.
customer_reviews.text: I have bought this set for years. Always new. When I received the product it was in a refurbished package and not sound at all the same as all my other sets at all. The microphone barely works. The plastic buds aren't the same and hard not to mention didn't come with the extra buds. Chargers are generic and cheap. I use to be in this industry for accessories and seems the seller is out for a quick buck and not focus on quality.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Gisch

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and Good Sound
customer_reviews.text: The headline says it all. Some have complained about the thin wires, but that hasn't been a problem for me. Obviously I keep it away from my cat because she's a monster. I love how the earbuds fit securely into the unit when not in use. Much better than previous versions.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Sandler

customer_reviews.title: LG TONE PRO HBS-780 Wireless Stereo Headset
customer_reviews.text: It sounds good; this stays fixed on the neck but the cables that connect the headphones to the bluetooth are very thin and they can break very easily; You have to treat it very carefully to avoid breaking it.
customer_reviews.author: Rudafris

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice design . Just for those who run and use this earphone I need to place an advice. Since the earphone’s body get jumped up and down around your neck you may rest the body over your ears like headband. Secondly, you can find this earphone in staple with price of 77$ after tax.
customer_reviews.author: JEFF K. A

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Junk these used to be the best headphones out, however now they male the cords about the size of fishing string which always short out. Dont expect them to last.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Wurfel

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made -  do not last
customer_reviews.text: I bought two sets. I loved them at first but, with the first the left bud stopped working in less than six months. Hoped it was a one-time thing. The second pair still works after four months but I have to turn them off and on several times to finally get them to work. I'm sure they will stop working soon. DO NOT BUY unless you plan to replace frequently!
customer_reviews.author: William Parkes

customer_reviews.title: Good for listening, not good for making phone calls
customer_reviews.text: I use it for listening during workout, sitting in a car, on the bed, etc. It works as intended. The sound is good. I wish the earplug would be better fit my ear though as it is easier to fall out than my old 760. Battery life is good so I don't need to worry too much. It is very bad when used to make phone calls though. The other side basically hears all muffled voice. So that functionality is basically not there.
customer_reviews.author: Chenjie Yu

customer_reviews.title: Right ear bud stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: Well my update on these head phones. No good. Same problem as the last version. The right ear bud stopped working. I guess I'll try a different brand. Don't waste your money on LG. If there was a no star that's what they would get.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Headset review
customer_reviews.text: The earbuds do not stay in. Even when your not working out or moving around a lot they just fall out. The buttons are tiny hard to get used to and the off button is inside of the headset while all other buttons are on the outside which could be good or bad depending on preference. A quick off when driving means inside off. Button is a little harder
customer_reviews.author: Amy L. Delisle

customer_reviews.title: Ear piece is too large
customer_reviews.text: The only thing I'm not crazy about...the ear piece is so large it keeps falling out of my ear and what time it is in makes my ear sore.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Johnson

customer_reviews.title: The sound and voice quality is good to
customer_reviews.text: I will always give LG a great review. While I have been through multiple headsets there warranty is amazing. No questions asked, new set in the mail each time
customer_reviews.author: ShopHappyMom

customer_reviews.title: Good product
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my boyfriend. He loves them. The battery can be a little weird and dies fast on some days. But overall a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Tabby

customer_reviews.title: - Cheap - Looks good Cons: - bad sound quality - uncomfortable - ...
customer_reviews.text: My old LG HBS 800 pair gave out on me, so I bought this 780 pair. Pros: - Cheap - Looks good Cons: - bad sound quality - uncomfortable - build quality is a downgrade over previous models - the cord part connecting the ear buds is so thin, I fear it will not last. I recommend looking elsewhere. I wish I could get my money back.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last long
customer_reviews.text: Have only had for a month and one ear bud doesn't work now. Seller is more than useless, received the product on the 8th of May, contacted them less than 45 days after receiving but they only have a 30 day return policy and told me to contact LG even though LG cannot do anything because i did not purchase through them. Waste of money!
customer_reviews.author: Hailey R.

customer_reviews.title: Refurbished tones no good
customer_reviews.text: The right side stopped working after about 3 weeks. Also they were cheaper due to the headset being refurbished. Also the box was somewhat torn up. I’m a firm believer you get what you pay for. I ended up going to Walmart & spending the extra cash for new retractable LG tones and had them now for 11 moths with no problems. Love the retractable tones with no issues what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Browning

customer_reviews.title: Battery life and sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. Battery needed charging after 4-5 hours when new. Run time has continued to decline and now won’t hold a charge 2.5 mos. after purchase. However the return window has closed so apparently I have no options. I love this style of earbuds. I was an early adopter of LG and have recommended them to countless friends. The quality has declined steadily over the years from the early models. Hopefully I can find another brand that returns me to high quality and long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: J. Krv.

customer_reviews.title: Headline
customer_reviews.text: Ordered it as new, and it was clearly a.refurbushed item. Box is supposed to contain a second set.of smaller ear buds, and there were none. The large tips are too large for most ears. Sound is rather thin on both bass and treble, with an overwhelming mid range. There are better options out there, I would recommend something else. I know I will be getting something different as soon as possible.
customer_reviews.author: Lee Moeller

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable to wear all day. Wind noise is a factor but that was expected. The Left ear bud has quite like the first one I bought about 6 months ago
customer_reviews.author: Ed Long

customer_reviews.title: Same problem with headset several times.
customer_reviews.text: Six weeks after delivery the right ear bud went out. Can’t send it back to Amazon because it’s pass 30 days. Now seller has auto response to my email. Tried email again only to get same response. Has been over a week with no response other then auto. Would not recommend SELLER and have great concerns about Amazon with warranty pass 30 days.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Karr

customer_reviews.title: Right ear piece stopped working.
customer_reviews.text: One of the earpieces stopped working after only a month of light use. Waste of money, as big of a company as LG is they should make their products more durable than this.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Terrible. The headset stay connected to my iPhone 7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Terrible. The headset stay connected to my iPhone 7 Plus only a third of the time. On several occasions I have the phone sitting on the table next to me and the head phones just disconnect or I am in the middle of a call and the head phones just disconnect and the phone is sitting right next to. I just stop using them and I’ve only had them a couple months
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Spend the money, buy the 1100
customer_reviews.text: There are plenty of cheaper headsets that will do the same thing from this same seller. Skip the cheap ones, get the good ones. Like I did. Seller is 100% zero complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Bedell

customer_reviews.title: Older models are better
customer_reviews.text: They worked great for a very short time. I purchased these to replace an older model that I had for a year. (I broke them.) The older model, 760, never gave me any trouble the whole year I had them. After one month of use with this series, the left ear stopped working and then 2 days later, the other ear went out. Don't buy these! The older model is better. If you do get them, purchase the protection plan.
customer_reviews.author: Amari

customer_reviews.title: Poor sound quality
customer_reviews.text: I’ve purchased 6 sets of these LG headsets over the past couple years. They have been various models but all similar price and features. This most recent set may indeed be my last. They were purchased as a gift and the quality of sound and clarity was poor. Despite reinstalling on an iPhone and various troubleshooting attempts, there was no improvement. Finally I replaced them with another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine J

product_meta.title: LG TONE PRO HBS-780 Wireless Stereo Headset, Black
product_meta.description: Color:BlackEnjoy a better sound experience on the go with the newly designed LG TONE PRO, featuring Advanced Quad Layer Speaker Technology for outstanding, well-balanced sound quality. Plus, with dual MEMS microphones it has never been easier to enjoy crisp and clear calls. As a premium Bluetooth wireless audio headset, the LG TONE PRO boasts smarter features such as Voice Memo, Find-Me and Tone & Talk for seamless control. The sleek, hidden magnetic earbud design is as practical as it is powerful featuring fine, low-profile wires for durability to ensure your device can deliver the best audio experience when and where you need it.
feature_bullets: Slim body and durable wires - enjoy a lightweight, hidden magnetic earbud design with fine, low profile wires for enhanced durability.
Advanced quad-layer speaker technology - experience outstanding sound quality with well-balanced sound in all bands.
Dual MEMS Microphones - never miss a moment of the conversation with enhanced voice clarity and charging time is less than 2 hours
Smarter user experience - feel the power of seamless control with smart features such as voice memo, Find-Me and Tone & Talk.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.8 out of 5 stars2,107 ratings3.8 out of 5 stars
